species.name: furret
descriptions: A FURRET has a very slim build. When under attack, it can squirm through narrow spaces and get away. In spite of its short limbs, it is very nimble and fleet.
It lives in narrow burrows that fit its slim body. The deeper the nests go, the more mazelike they become.
It makes a nest to suit its long and skinny body. The nest is impossible for other Pok√©mon to enter.
The mother puts its offspring to sleep by curling up around them. It corners foes with speed.
There is no telling where its tail begins. Despite its short legs, it is quick at hunting RATTATA.

abilities.name: run-away
abilities.effect: Ensures success fleeing from wild battles.

abilities.name: frisk
abilities.effect: Reveals an opponent's held item upon entering battle.
